Articles.Content:
Having a problem with a new campaign where contracts for breaking certain altitudes wont register, uninstalled the usual suspect (kopernicus) and no difference, have a lot of mods installed but just wondering if anyone else has had experience with this same issue.

Pic related

https://imgur.com/a/FBOiFUm

EDIT: Update: doing the first orbit mission and contract also does not recognize that I am in orbit, though I am, but the next mission "orbit & recovery" does recognize me being in orbit after force completing the prior orbit mission. Also, it might be helpful to let others know I am playing v1.7.1
